meanings.definition: A pad worn under clothing to absorb bodily fluids.
meanings.sent1: She always wears underpads to stay dry.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provides underpads for patients.
meanings.sent3: The underpads kept her clothes clean during the accident.
meanings.sent4: His underpads were like a shield against embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The underpads were soft and comfortable against her skin.

meanings.definition: Pads placed under bedding or furniture to protect against leaks.
meanings.sent1: They use underpads to protect the mattress.
meanings.sent2: The underpads prevented any spills on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The underpads played hide and seek under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The underpads were the guardians of the floor.
meanings.sent5: Underpads are like secret protectors for furniture.
